name: Andrew Lloyd Webber Musicals: Sing & Dance
name_original: Andrew Lloyd Webber Musicals: Sing & Dance
description:
Andrew Lloyd Webber Musicals: Sing & Dance is an arcade game developed by Tubby Games. It came out on 09-11-2012. It was published by Deep Silver.
Andrew Lloyd Webber Musicals: Sing & Dance is available on Wii.
